amendment.description: Upon the adoption of the conference report the House shall be considered to have adopted the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 196) making corrections in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 2647.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 187 (Roll no. 764).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
